script:
William   Excuse me, sir, will you take a picture of us?
Susan     Sure. This is a really nice camera.
William   Thanks, my parents gave it to me.
Susan     How do you use it?
William   You press this button here.
Susan     Come a little closer. Wait, that's too close. Move a little to the left. Move back a little farther. OK, stay right there.
William   Do you mean here?
Susan     Yes, that's good. Oh, I can't get it to work.
William   You need to hold down the button for about 3 seconds.
Susan     OK I got it, are you ready?
William   Yes.
Susan     Smile.
